1.8 Database introspection

unique-index?

Generic function

Summary

Returns #t if the given index is unique.

Signature

unique-index? index => unique

Arguments

index
An instance of <index>.

Values

unique
An instance of <boolean>.

Library

SQL

Module

SQL

Description

Returns #t if the given index is unique.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
